verses.verse: וַיַּבְדֵּ֣ל <S%H914><s%> vai-yav-Del separated דָּוִיד֩ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid Moreover David וְשָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Rei and the captains הַצָּבָ֜א <S%H6635><s%> hatz-tza-Va of the host לַעֲבֹדָ֗ה <S%H5656><s%> la-'a-vo-Dah, to the service לִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the sons אָסָף֙ <S%H623><s%> 'a-Saf of Asaph וְהֵימָ֣ן <S%H1968><s%> ve-hei-Man and of Heman וִֽידוּת֔וּן <S%H3038><s%> vi-du-Tun, and of Jeduthun; הַנְּבִּיאִים han-ne-bi-'im כהַֽנִּבְּאִ֛ים <S%H5030><s%> han-nib-be-'Im prophecy קבְּכִנֹּר֥וֹת <S%H3658><s%> be-chin-no-Rot with harps בִּנְבָלִ֖ים <S%H5035><s%> bin-va-Lim with psalteries וּבִמְצִלְתָּ֑יִם <S%H4700><s%> u-vim-tzil-Ta-yim; and with cymbals וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become מִסְפָּרָ֔ם <S%H4557><s%> mis-pa-Ram, and the number אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei of those מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah performed לַעֲבֹדָתָֽם׃ <S%H5656><s%> la-'a-vo-da-Tam. according to their service

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei Of the sons אָסָ֗ף <S%H623><s%> 'a-Saf, of Asaph זַכּ֧וּר <S%H2139><s%> zak-Kur Zaccur וְיוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> ve-yo-Sef and Joseph וּנְתַנְיָ֥ה <S%H5418><s%> u-ne-tan-Yah and Nethaniah וַאֲשַׂרְאֵ֖לָה <S%H841><s%> va-'a-sar-'E-lah and Asarelah בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons אָסָ֑ף <S%H623><s%> 'a-Saf; of Asaph עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al under יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- under the hands אָסָ֔ף <S%H623><s%> 'a-Saf, of Asaph הַנִּבָּ֖א <S%H5012><s%> han-nib-Ba which prophesied עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- under יְדֵ֥י <S%H3027><s%> ye-Dei according to the order הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. of the king

לִידוּת֑וּן <S%H3038><s%> li-du-Tun; Of Jeduthun בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons יְדוּת֡וּן <S%H3038><s%> ye-du-Tun of Jeduthun גְּדַלְיָ֡הוּ <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Ya-hu Gedaliah וּצְרִ֡י <S%H6874><s%> u-tze-Ri and Zeri וִֽ֠ישַׁעְיָהוּ <S%H3470><s%> Vi-sha'-ya-hu and Jeshaiah חֲשַׁבְיָ֨הוּ <S%H2811><s%> cha-shav-Ya-hu Hashabiah וּמַתִּתְיָ֜הוּ <S%H4993><s%> u-mat-tit-Ya-hu and Mattithiah שִׁשָּׁ֗ה <S%H8337><s%> shish-Shah, six עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> 'al under יְדֵ֨י <S%H3027><s%> ye-Dei under the hands אֲבִיהֶ֤ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem of their father יְדוּתוּן֙ <S%H3038><s%> ye-du-Tun Jeduthun בַּכִּנּ֔וֹר <S%H3658><s%> bak-kin-Nor, with a harp הַנִּבָּ֕א <S%H5012><s%> han-nib-Ba who prophesied עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- under הֹד֥וֹת <S%H3034><s%> ho-Dot to give thanks וְהַלֵּ֖ל <S%H1984><s%> ve-hal-Lel and to praise לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

לְהֵימָ֑ן <S%H1968><s%> le-hei-Man; Of Heman בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons הֵימָ֡ן <S%H1968><s%> hei-Man of Heman בֻּקִּיָּ֡הוּ <S%H1232><s%> buk-ki-Ya-hu Bukkiah מַתַּנְיָ֡הוּ <S%H4983><s%> mat-tan-Ya-hu Mattaniah עֻ֠זִּיאֵל <S%H5816><s%> 'Uz-zi-'el Uzziel שְׁבוּאֵ֨ל <S%H7619><s%> she-vu-'El Shebuel וִֽירִימ֜וֹת <S%H3406><s%> vi-ri-Mot and Jerimoth חֲנַנְיָ֣ה <S%H2608><s%> cha-nan-Yah Hananiah חֲנָ֗נִי <S%H2607><s%> cha-Na-ni, Hanani אֱלִיאָ֤תָה <S%H448><s%> 'e-li-'A-tah Eliathah גִדַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <S%H1437><s%> gid-Dal-ti Giddalti וְרֹמַ֣מְתִּי ve-ro-Mam-ti עֶ֔זֶר <S%H7320><s%> 'E-zer, and Romamtiezer יָשְׁבְּקָ֣שָׁה <S%H3436><s%> ya-she-be-Ka-shah Joshbekashah מַלּ֔וֹתִי <S%H4413><s%> mal-Lo-ti, Mallothi הוֹתִ֖יר <S%H1956><s%> ho-Tir Hothir מַחֲזִיאֽוֹת׃ <S%H4238><s%> ma-cha-zi-'ot. [and] Mahazioth

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these בָנִ֜ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim All these [were] the sons לְהֵימָ֗ן <S%H1968><s%> le-hei-Man, of Heman חֹזֵ֥ה <S%H2374><s%> cho-Zeh seer הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king's בְּדִבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> be-div-Rei in the words הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God לְהָרִ֣ים <S%H7311><s%> le-ha-Rim to lift up קָ֑רֶן <S%H7161><s%> Ka-ren; the horn וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten gave הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him And God לְהֵימָ֗ן <S%H1968><s%> le-hei-Man, to Heman בָּנִ֛ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim sons אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen וּבָנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> u-va-Not daughters שָׁלֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H7969><s%> sha-Loosh. and three

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- were under יְדֵי֩ <S%H3027><s%> ye-Dei All these [were] under the hands אֲבִיהֶ֨ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem of their father בַּשִּׁ֜יר <S%H7892><s%> bash-Shir for song בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit [in] the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בִּמְצִלְתַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4700><s%> bim-tzil-Ta-yim with cymbals נְבָלִ֣ים <S%H5035><s%> ne-va-Lim psalteries וְכִנֹּר֔וֹת <S%H3658><s%> ve-chin-no-Rot, and harps לַעֲבֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> la-'a-vo-Dat for the service בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al under יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> ye-Dei order הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, according to the king's ס sa-Mek אָסָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> 'a-Saf to Asaph וִידוּת֖וּן <S%H3038><s%> vi-du-Tun Jeduthun וְהֵימָֽן׃ <S%H1968><s%> ve-hei-Man. and Heman

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become מִסְפָּרָם֙ <S%H4557><s%> mis-pa-Ram So the number עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Hem, of them with their brethren מְלֻמְּדֵי־ <S%H3925><s%> me-lum-me-dei- that were instructed שִׁ֖יר <S%H7892><s%> shir in the songs לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- that הַ֨מֵּבִ֔ין <S%H995><s%> ham-me-Vin, [even] all that were cunning מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> ma-Ta-yim was two hundred שְׁמוֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> she-mo-Nim fourscore וּשְׁמוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight

וַיַּפִּ֜ילוּ <S%H5307><s%> vai-yap-Pi-lu And they cast גּוֹרָל֣וֹת <S%H1486><s%> go-ra-Lot lots מִשְׁמֶ֗רֶת <S%H4931><s%> mish-Me-ret, ward לְעֻמַּת֙ <S%H5980><s%> le-'um-Mat against כַּקָּטֹ֣ן <S%H6996><s%> kak-ka-Ton [ward] as well the small כַּגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> kag-ga-Dol, as the great מֵבִ֖ין <S%H995><s%> me-Vin the teacher עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- accompanying תַּלְמִֽיד׃ <S%H8527><s%> tal-Mid. as the scholar פ Peh

וַיֵּצֵ֞א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze came forth הַגּוֹרָ֧ל <S%H1486><s%> hag-go-Ral lot הָרִאשׁ֛וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon Now the first לְאָסָ֖ף <S%H623><s%> le-'a-Saf for Asaph לְיוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> le-yo-Sef; to Joseph גְּדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Ya-hu to Gedaliah הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, the second הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- he וְאֶחָ֥יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav who with his brethren וּבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav and sons שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֣י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi The third זַכּ֔וּר <S%H2139><s%> zak-Kur, to Zaccur בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

הָרְבִיעִי֙ <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I The fourth לַיִּצְרִ֔י <S%H3339><s%> lai-yitz-Ri, to Izri בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

הַחֲמִישִׁ֣י <S%H2549><s%> ha-cha-mi-Shi The fifth נְתַנְיָ֔הוּ <S%H5418><s%> ne-tan-Ya-hu, to Nethaniah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

הַשִּׁשִּׁ֣י <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shi The sixth בֻקִּיָּ֔הוּ <S%H1232><s%> vuk-ki-Ya-hu, to Bukkiah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

הַשְּׁבִעִ֣י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I The seventh יְשַׂרְאֵ֔לָה <S%H3480><s%> ye-sar-'E-lah, to Jesharelah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

הַשְּׁמִינִ֣י <S%H8066><s%> hash-she-mi-Ni The eighth יְשַֽׁעְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3470><s%> ye-sha'-Ya-hu, to Jeshaiah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

הַתְּשִׁיעִ֣י <S%H8671><s%> hat-te-shi-'I The ninth מַתַּנְיָ֔הוּ <S%H4983><s%> mat-tan-Ya-hu, to Mattaniah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

הָעֲשִׂירִ֣י <S%H6224><s%> ha-'a-si-Ri The tenth שִׁמְעִ֔י <S%H8096><s%> shim-'I, to Shimei בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

עַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H6249><s%> 'ash-tei- eleven עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten עֲזַרְאֵ֔ל <S%H5832><s%> 'a-zar-'El, to Azareel בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

הַשְּׁנֵ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> hash-she-Neim both עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten לַחֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <S%H2811><s%> la-cha-shav-Yah, to Hashabiah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

לִשְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> lish-lo-Shah three עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten שֽׁוּבָאֵ֔ל <S%H7619><s%> shu-va-'El, to Shubael בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

לְאַרְבָּעָ֤ה <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen מַתִּתְיָ֔הוּ <S%H4993><s%> mat-tit-Ya-hu, to Mattithiah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

לַחֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> la-cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen לִֽירֵמ֔וֹת <S%H3406><s%> li-re-Mot, to Jeremoth בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

לְשִׁשָּׁ֤ה <S%H8337><s%> le-shish-Shah six עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen לַחֲנַנְיָ֔הוּ <S%H2608><s%> la-cha-nan-Ya-hu, to Hananiah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten
